sentences.en: A couple of plain-clothes men had been sniffing round his apartment.
sentences.cn: 几名便衣男子一直在他的公寓周边打探。

sentences.en: He wore a plain blue shirt, open at the collar.
sentences.cn: 他穿一件素净的蓝色衬衫，领口敞着。

sentences.en: Is it love of publicity or plain stupidity on her part?
sentences.cn: 她是喜欢抛头露面，还是太过愚蠢了呢？

sentences.en: It was plain to him that I was having a nervous breakdown.
sentences.cn: 他能明显地看出我快要精神崩溃了。

sentences.en: Lawson writes so well: in plain English, without fuss or affectation.
sentences.cn: 劳森写得很好：英文通俗易懂，朴实无华又不矫揉造作。

sentences.en: Let me make it plain (= state it clearly ) . We do not want you here.
sentences.cn: 让我明说吧，我们不想你待在这儿。

sentences.en: Let’s have some plain, truthful answers.
sentences.cn: 让我们听听坦率而真实的回答吧。

sentences.en: Pictures add interest to plain painted walls.
sentences.cn: 相片给素色的墙面增添了一抹情趣。

sentences.en: Pregnancy wasn't all plain sailing and once again there were problems.
sentences.cn: 孕期并非一帆风顺，这不，又出现问题了。

sentences.en: She swapped her plain suit for an absurdly girlie dress.
sentences.cn: 她脱下了朴素的套装，换上了一身古怪的少女装。

sentences.en: She was a plain-looking woman with a weak chin.
sentences.cn: 她相貌平平，性格懦弱。

sentences.en: The advantages were plain to see.
sentences.cn: 优势显而易见。

sentences.en: The document, written in plain English, tells you about your new policy.
sentences.cn: 这份文件用简明的英语写成，解释了你们的新政策。

sentences.en: The food was just plain terrible.
sentences.cn: 这食物实在太难吃了。

sentences.en: The grassy plain gave way to an extensive swamp.
sentences.cn: 青草覆盖的平原被广阔的沼泽地所取代。

sentences.en: The implication was plain, if left unstated.
sentences.cn: 其含意不言而喻。

sentences.en: the vast plains of central China
sentences.cn: 华中地区的广阔平原

sentences.en: To reconstitute dried tomatoes, simmer in plain water until they are tender.
sentences.cn: 要泡开西红柿干，需要将其放在清水中用文火炖，直到它们变软。

sentences.en: Truscott's verbosity made it hard to separate plain fact from decorative embellishment.
sentences.cn: 特拉斯科特说话啰唆，让人很难分清哪是纯粹的事实哪是添油加醋的修饰之辞。

sentences.en: Why couldn't they call you plain Ann or Alice like the rest?
sentences.cn: 他们为什么不能像其他人一样，给你取个普普通通的安或艾丽斯的名字呢？

sentences.en: You can often choose between plain white or coloured and patterned scarves.
sentences.cn: 常可在纯白色或带图案的彩色围巾中作出选择。

sentences.en: You don't need any special skills for this job, just plain common sense.
sentences.cn: 这项工作不需要任何特殊技能，只要有普通常识就够了。

sentences.en: You have made your feelings plain enough.
sentences.cn: 你已经明确表示了你的感受。

words.tran_cn: 明白地；坦率地；平坦地；朴素地
[地理]平原；无格式；朴实无华的东西

phrases.tran_cn: 冲积平原；冲积系；冲积平野

phrases.phrase: as plain as the nose on one's face

phrases.tran_cn: [地]泛滥平原，冲积平原；河漫滩
用浅显的英语；说得明白点；坦白地说
(非正式)[用于强调前面或后面的观点]当然
滑动轴承；平面轴承；普通轴承；滑体轴承
素混凝土；纯混凝土；无钢混凝土
简明英语；通俗易懂的话
纯文本；没有加密过的文件

trans.tran_cn: 清楚的，坦诚的，单色的，朴素的，普通的，明显的，相貌平平的，平针的，完全的
trans.tran_en: very clear, and easy to understand or recognize
a large area of flat dry land
